question: White to move. Find the checkmate in 2 moves. Position: White Kh1, Qd1, Rf1; Black Kg8, Rf8, pawns g7, h7.

reasoning_steps.content: Analyze the position: Black king is on g8, restricted by pawns on g7 and h7. The back rank is weak with only Rf8 defending.
Consider Qd8: This attacks the rook and threatens back rank mate. Black must respond to the threat.
After 1.Qd8 Rxd8, White plays 2.Rxf8#. The rook delivers checkmate on the back rank.
